body:
### About
As the tagline says: This app will make you life easier when developing with Tomcat (guaranteed).

### Screenshots
![Tomcat Quick Screenshot](https://docs.google.com/open?id=0B8afqKXy6Ha5OTk2Q3p6b2tCaWs)

### Authors and Contributors
Well me (@Eyal-Shalev).
Of Course anyone is welcomed to support.

### Contact
Having trouble with Tomcat Quick? contact eyalsh@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll be happy to help you sort it out.
tagline: Adds a menu button to the top right mac menu with an option to start & stop tomcat.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Tomcat Quick
